property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT h.OWNER_ID AS owner_id, h.CREATE_DATE AS create_time, h.MAX_AMOUNT AS max_amount, h.MIN_AMOUNT AS min_amount, h.DOMAIN AS domain, h.CUST_IP AS cust_ip, h.PHONE AS phone, h.VALID AS valid, h.OWNER_ROLE AS owner_role, h.MANUAL_AUDIT AS manual_audit, h.USE_PHONE_CHECK AS use_phone_check, h.OPERATOR AS operator, h.DAY_MAX_AMOUNT AS day_max_amount, h.BOSS_AUDIT AS boss_audit, h.START_TIME AS start_time, h.END_TIME AS end_time, h.FIRE_TYPE AS fire_type FROM service_config_history h WHERE 1 = 1 /~owner_id: and h.owner_id = '[owner_id]' ~/ ORDER BY h.id DESC

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT dr.REQUEST_NO as request_no, dr.FLOW_NO as flow_no, dr.OWNER_ID as owner_id, dr.REQUEST_TYPE as request_type, dr.ACCOUNT_NO as account_no, dr.ACCOUNT_NAME as account_name, dr.ACCOUNT_TYPE as account_type, dr.CER_TYPE as cert_type, dr.CARD_TYPE as card_type, dr.CER_NO as cert_no, CONVERT(dr.AMOUNT,CHAR) as amount, dr.AUDIT_STATUS as audit_status, dr.AUDIT_DATE as audit_date, dr.DESCRIPTION as description, dr.CREATE_DATE as create_date, dr.STATUS as status, dr.complete_Msg as error_msg, dr.complete_Date as finish_date, dr.operator as operator, dr.bank_Code as bankCode, dr.bank_Name as bank_name, dr.validity as validity, dr.cvv as cvv, dr.fee as fee, dr.REMIT_ADUTI_REASON as remit_aduti_reason FROM REQUEST dr where 1=1 /~flowId:AND dr.FLOW_NO = '[flowId]'~/ /~requestNo: AND dr.REQUEST_NO = '[requestNo]'~/ /~requestType: AND dr.REQUEST_TYPE = '[requestType]'~/ /~applyDate1: AND Date(dr.CREATE_DATE) >= str_to_date('[applyDate1]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~applyDate2: AND Date(dr.CREATE_DATE) <= str_to_date('[applyDate2]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~finish_date1: AND Date(dr.complete_Date) >= str_to_date('[finish_date1]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~finish_date2: AND Date(dr.complete_Date) <= str_to_date('[finish_date2]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~df.auditStatus: AND dr.AUDIT_STATUS = '[df.auditStatus]'~/ /~accountNo: AND dr.ACCOUNT_NO like '%[accountNo]%'~/ /~df.status: AND dr.STATUS = '[df.status]'~/ /~accountName: AND dr.ACCOUNT_NAME like '%[accountName]%'~/ /~ownerId: AND dr.OWNER_ID = '[ownerId]'~/ /~amountStart: AND dr.AMOUNT >= '[amountStart]'~/ /~amountEnd: AND dr.AMOUNT <='[amountEnd]'~/ /~operator: AND dr.operator = '[operator]'~/ /~auditStatus: AND dr.AUDIT_STATUS = '[auditStatus]'~/ /~requestStatus: AND dr.STATUS = '[requestStatus]'~/ /~accountType: AND dr.ACCOUNT_TYPE = '[accountType]'~/ /~cardType: AND dr.CARD_TYPE = '[cardType]'~/ /~certType: AND dr.CER_TYPE = '[certType]'~/ /~audit_date1: AND Date(dr.AUDIT_DATE) >= str_to_date('[audit_date1]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~audit_date2: AND Date(dr.AUDIT_DATE) <= str_to_date('[audit_date2]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ order by dr.CREATE_DATE desc

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT dr.REQUEST_NO as request_no, dr.FLOW_NO as flow_no, dr.OWNER_ID as owner_id, dr.ACCOUNT_NO as account_no, dr.ACCOUNT_NAME as account_name, dr.ACCOUNT_TYPE as account_type, dr.REQUEST_TYPE as request_type, dr.CER_TYPE as cert_type, dr.CARD_TYPE as card_type, dr.CER_NO as cert_no, CONVERT(dr.AMOUNT,CHAR) as amount, dr.AUDIT_STATUS as audit_status, dr.DESCRIPTION as description, dr.CREATE_DATE as create_date, dr.STATUS as status, dr.complete_Msg as error_msg, dr.complete_Date as finish_date, dr.operator as operator, dr.bank_Code as bankCode, dr.bank_Name as bank_name, dr.validity as validity, dr.cvv as cvv, dr.fee as fee, dr.REMIT_ADUTI_REASON as remit_aduti_reason, dr.AUDIT_DATE as audit_date FROM REQUEST dr where 1=1 /~auditStatus:AND dr.AUDIT_STATUS = '[auditStatus]'~/ /~flowId:AND dr.FLOW_NO = '[flowId]'~/ /~requestType: AND dr.REQUEST_TYPE = '[requestType]'~/ /~accountNo:AND dr.ACCOUNT_NO = '[accountNo]'~/ /~requestNo: AND dr.REQUEST_NO = '[requestNo]'~/ /~applyDate1: AND Date(dr.CREATE_DATE) >= str_to_date('[applyDate1]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~applyDate2: AND Date(dr.CREATE_DATE) <= str_to_date('[applyDate2]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~finish_date1: AND Date(dhr.finish_date) >= str_to_date('[finish_date1] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~finish_date2: AND Date(dhr.finish_date) <= str_to_date('[finish_date2] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~df.status: AND dr.STATUS = '[df.status]'~/ /~accountName: AND dr.ACCOUNT_NAME like '%[accountName]%'~/ /~amountStart: AND dr.AMOUNT >= '[amountStart]'~/ /~amountEnd: AND dr.AMOUNT <='[amountEnd]'~/ /~ownerId: AND dr.OWNER_ID = '[ownerId]'~/ /~operator: AND dr.operator = '[operator]'~/ /~accountType: AND dr.ACCOUNT_TYPE = '[accountType]'~/ /~cardType: AND dr.CARD_TYPE = '[cardType]'~/ /~certType: AND dr.CER_TYPE = '[certType]'~/ /~auditDate1: AND Date(dr.AUDIT_DATE) >= str_to_date('[auditDate1]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~auditDate2: AND Date(dr.AUDIT_DATE) <= str_to_date('[auditDate2]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ order by dr.CREATE_DATE desc

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT dr.REQUEST_NO as request_no, dr.FLOW_NO as flow_no, dr.OWNER_ID as owner_id, dr.ACCOUNT_NO as account_no, dr.REQUEST_TYPE as request_type, dr.ACCOUNT_NAME as account_name, dr.ACCOUNT_TYPE as account_type, dr.CER_TYPE as cert_type, dr.CARD_TYPE as card_type, dr.CER_NO as cert_no, CONVERT(dr.AMOUNT,CHAR) as amount, dr.AUDIT_STATUS as audit_status, dr.AUDIT_DATE as audit_date, dr.DESCRIPTION as description, dr.CREATE_DATE as create_date, dr.STATUS as status, dr.complete_Msg as error_msg, dr.complete_Date as finish_date, dr.operator as operator, dr.bank_Code as bankCode, dr.bank_Name as bank_name, dr.validity as validity, dr.cvv as cvv, dr.fee as fee, dr.REMIT_ADUTI_REASON as remit_aduti_reason FROM REQUEST dr where 1=1 /~flowId:AND dr.FLOW_NO = '[flowId]'~/ /~requestNo: AND dr.REQUEST_NO = '[requestNo]'~/ /~requestType: AND dr.REQUEST_TYPE = '[requestType]'~/ /~applyDate1: AND Date(dr.CREATE_DATE) >= str_to_date('[applyDate1] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~applyDate2: AND Date(dr.CREATE_DATE) <= str_to_date('[applyDate2] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~finish_date1: AND Date(dr.complete_Date) >= str_to_date('[finish_date1] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~finish_date2: AND Date(dr.complete_Date) <= str_to_date('[finish_date2] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~df.auditStatus: AND dr.AUDIT_STATUS = '[df.auditStatus]'~/ /~df.status: AND dr.STATUS = '[df.status]'~/ /~accountName: AND dr.ACCOUNT_NAME like '%[accountName]%'~/ /~ownerId: AND dr.OWNER_ID = '[ownerId]'~/ /~operator: AND dr.operator = '[operator]'~/ /~amountStart: AND dr.AMOUNT >= '[amountStart]'~/ /~amountEnd: AND dr.AMOUNT <='[amountEnd]'~/ /~auditStatus: AND dr.AUDIT_STATUS = '[auditStatus]'~/ /~requestStatus: AND dr.STATUS = '[requestStatus]'~/ /~accountType: AND dr.ACCOUNT_TYPE = '[accountType]'~/ /~cardType: AND dr.CARD_TYPE = '[cardType]'~/ /~certType: AND dr.CER_TYPE = '[certType]'~/ order by dr.id asc

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT count(dr.FLOW_NO) as flow_no, CONVERT(sum(dr.AMOUNT),CHAR) as amount, round(sum(dr.fee),2) as fee FROM REQUEST dr where 1=1 /~flowId:AND dr.FLOW_NO = '[flowId]'~/ /~requestNo: AND dr.REQUEST_NO = '[requestNo]'~/ /~requestType: AND dr.REQUEST_TYPE = '[requestType]'~/ /~applyDate1: AND Date(dr.CREATE_DATE) >= str_to_date('[applyDate1]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~applyDate2: AND Date(dr.CREATE_DATE) <= str_to_date('[applyDate2]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~finish_date1: AND Date(dr.complete_Date) >= str_to_date('[finish_date1]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~finish_date2: AND Date(dr.complete_Date) <= str_to_date('[finish_date2]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~df.auditStatus: AND dr.AUDIT_STATUS = '[df.auditStatus]'~/ /~df.status: AND dr.STATUS = '[df.status]'~/ /~accountName: AND dr.ACCOUNT_NAME like '%[accountName]%'~/ /~ownerId: AND dr.OWNER_ID = '[ownerId]'~/ /~operator: AND dr.operator = '[operator]'~/ /~amountStart: AND dr.AMOUNT >= '[amountStart]'~/ /~amountEnd: AND dr.AMOUNT <='[amountEnd]'~/ /~auditStatus: AND dr.AUDIT_STATUS = '[auditStatus]'~/ /~requestStatus: AND dr.STATUS = '[requestStatus]'~/ /~accountType: AND dr.ACCOUNT_TYPE = '[accountType]'~/ /~cardType: AND dr.CARD_TYPE = '[cardType]'~/ /~certType: AND dr.CER_TYPE = '[certType]'~/ order by dr.CREATE_DATE desc

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT dr.REQUEST_NO as request_no, dr.FLOW_NO as flow_no, dr.OWNER_ID as owner_id, dr.REQUEST_TYPE as request_type, dr.ACCOUNT_NO as account_no, dr.ACCOUNT_NAME as account_name, CONVERT(dr.AMOUNT,CHAR) as amount, dr.AUDIT_STATUS as audit_status, dr.DESCRIPTION as description, dr.CREATE_DATE as create_date, dr.STATUS as status, dr.complete_Msg as error_msg, dr.complete_Date as finish_date, dr.operator as operator, dr.bank_Code as bankCode, dr.bank_Name as bankName, dr.validity as validity, dr.cvv as cvv, dr.fee as fee, dr.REMIT_ADUTI_REASON as remit_aduti_reason FROM REQUEST dr where 1=1 /~flowId:AND dr.FLOW_NO = '[flowId]'~/ /~requestNo: AND dr.REQUEST_NO = '[requestNo]'~/ /~requestType: AND dr.REQUEST_TYPE = '[requestType]'~/ /~applyDate1: AND Date(dr.CREATE_DATE) >= str_to_date('[applyDate1] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~applyDate2: AND Date(dr.CREATE_DATE) <= str_to_date('[applyDate2] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~finish_date1: AND Date(dhr.finish_date) >= str_to_date('[finish_date1] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~finish_date2: AND Date(dhr.finish_date) <= str_to_date('[finish_date2] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~df.auditStatus: AND dr.AUDIT_STATUS = '[df.auditStatus]'~/ /~df.status: AND dr.STATUS = '[df.status]'~/ /~amountStart: AND dr.AMOUNT >= '[amountStart]'~/ /~amountEnd: AND dr.AMOUNT <='[amountEnd]'~/ /~accountName: AND dr.ACCOUNT_NAME like '%[accountName]%'~/ /~ownerId: AND dr.OWNER_ID = '[ownerId]'~/ /~operator: AND dr.operator = '[operator]'~/ order by dr.CREATE_DATE desc

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT count(dr.id) as count FROM REQUEST dr where 1=1 /~requestType: AND dr.REQUEST_TYPE = '[requestType]'~/ /~createDate1: AND Date(dr.CREATE_DATE) >= str_to_date('[applyDate1] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~createDate2: AND Date(dr.CREATE_DATE) <= str_to_date('[applyDate2] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~ownerId: AND dr.OWNER_ID = '[ownerId]'~/ /~amountStart: AND dr.AMOUNT >= '[amountStart]'~/ /~amountEnd: AND dr.AMOUNT <='[amountEnd]'~/ /~handle_status: AND dr.STATUS IN ([handle_status])~/

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT CONVERT(sum(dr.AMOUNT),CHAR) as amount FROM REQUEST dr where 1=1 /~requestType: AND dr.REQUEST_TYPE = '[requestType]'~/ /~createDate1: AND Date(dr.CREATE_DATE) >= str_to_date('[applyDate1] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~createDate2: AND Date(dr.CREATE_DATE) <= str_to_date('[applyDate2] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~ownerId: AND dr.OWNER_ID = '[ownerId]'~/ /~amountStart: AND dr.AMOUNT >= '[amountStart]'~/ /~amountEnd: AND dr.AMOUNT <='[amountEnd]'~/ /~handle_status: AND dr.STATUS IN ([handle_status])~/

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT dch.ID as id, dch.CREATE_DATE as create_date, dch.REMIT_TYPE as remit_type, dch.MIN_AMOUNT as min_amount, dch.MAX_AMOUNT as max_amount, dch.AUDIT_AMOUNT as audit_amount, dch.REREMIT_FLAG as reremit_flag, dch.START_TIME as start_time, dch.END_TIME as end_time, dch.HOLIDAY_STATUS as holiday_status, dch.STATUS as status, dch.OPER as oper FROM DPAY_CONFIG_HISTORY dch where 1=1 order by dch.ID desc

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT dr.REQUEST_NO as request_no, dr.FLOW_NO as flow_no, dr.OWNER_ID as owner_id, dr.ACCOUNT_NO as account_no, dr.ACCOUNT_NAME as account_name, dr.ACCOUNT_TYPE as account_type, dr.CER_TYPE as cert_type, dr.CARD_TYPE as card_type, dr.CER_NO as cert_no, CONVERT(dr.AMOUNT,CHAR) as amount, dr.AUDIT_STATUS as audit_status, dr.AUDIT_DATE as audit_date, dr.DESCRIPTION as description, dr.CREATE_DATE as create_date, dr.STATUS as status, dr.complete_Msg as error_msg, dr.complete_Date as finish_date, dr.operator as operator, dr.bank_Code as bank_code, dr.validity as validity, dr.cvv as cvv, dr.oper_Time as oper_time, dr.oper as oper, dr.reason as reason FROM REQUEST_HISTORY dr where 1=1 /~flowId:AND dr.FLOW_NO = '[flowId]'~/ order by dr.id desc

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT rc.ID as id, rc.CREATE_DATE as create_date, rc.CODE as code, rc.NAME as name, rc.ROUTE_INFO as route_info, rc.STATUS as status FROM ROUTE_CONFIG rc where 1=1 /~code:and rc.CODE = '[code]' ~/ /~name:and rc.NAME = '[name]' ~/ /~status:and rc.STATUS = '[status]' ~/ order by rc.ID desc

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT rch.ID as id, rch.CREATE_DATE as create_date, rch.ROUTE_INFO as route_info, rch.STATUS as status, rch.OPER as oper FROM ROUTE_CONFIG_HISTORY rch where 1=1 order by rch.ID desc

property.name: sql
property.value: select p.ID as id, p.OWNER_ID as owner_id, p.ACCOUNT_NO as account_no, p.ACCOUNT_NAME as account_name, p.ACCOUNT_TYPE as account_type, p.OPEN_BANK_NAME as open_bank_name, p.CREATE_DATE as create_date, p.BANK_CODE as bank_code, p.SABK_CODE as sabk_code, p.SABK_NAME as sabk_name, p.CNAPS_CODE as cnaps_code, p.CNAPS_NAME as cnaps_name, p.ID_CARD_NO as id_card_no from payee p where 1=1 /~customer_no: and p.owner_id = '[customer_no]' ~/ /~create_time_start: and p.create_date >= str_to_date('[create_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~create_time_end: and p.create_date <= str_to_date('[create_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~account_no: and p.account_no = '[account_no]' ~/ /~account_name: and p.account_name = '[account_name]' ~/ /~account_type: and p.account_type = '[account_type]' ~/ /~open_bank_name: and p.OPEN_BANK_NAME like '%[open_bank_name]%' ~/ order by p.ID desc

property.name: sql
property.value: select s.ID as id, s.OWNER_ID as owner_id, s.CREATE_DATE as create_date, s.OWNER_ROLE as owner_role, s.VALID as valid, s.PHONE as phone, s.COMPLEX_PASSWORD as complex_password, s.USE_PHONE_CHECK as use_phone_check, s.PUBLIC_KEY as public_key, s.PRIVATE_KEY as private_key, s.CUST_IP as cust_ip, s.DOMAIN as domain, s.MIN_AMOUNT as min_amount, s.MAX_AMOUNT as max_amount, s.HOLIDAYSTATUS as holiday_status, s.DAY_MAX_AMOUNT as day_max_amount, s.BOSS_AUDIT as boss_audit, s.START_TIME as start_time, s.END_TIME as end_time, s.FIRE_TYPE as fire_type from service_config s where 1=1 /~owner_id: and s.owner_id = '[owner_id]' ~/ /~owner_role: and s.owner_role = '[owner_role]' ~/ /~valid: and s.valid = '[valid]' ~/ order by s.ID desc
